text: The International Association of Universities (IAU) is an association of universities that belongs to UNESCO. It brings together educational institutions from some 120 countries. They work together on common concerns and projects. The organisation also works with various international and national groups active in higher education. It was established in 1950 in Paris, France. == Other websites == *International Association of Universities Category:International organizations Category:1950 establishments Category:Organizations based in Paris
title: International Association of Universities
